attributes.action: TELL US how Tim Loughton will find 'respected figures from the legal system' to conduct a Westminster child abuse inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: There are very few people outside the Westminster Bubble who have anything but distaste for a legal system which is based on patronage.  As long as judges are appointed by politicians and ALWAYS end up in ermine after finding for the government in any inquiry, THERE WILL NEVER BE ANY RESPECT FOR OUR FUNDAMENTALLY FLAWED LEGAL SYSTEM.
